00042 //---------------------------------------------------------
00043 //   Part
00044 //---------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 class Part {
00047       Score* cs;
00048       QString _trackName;           // used in tracklist
00049       QString _longName;            // shown on first system
00050       QString _shortName;           // shown on followup systems
00051       Instrument _instrument;
00052       StaffList* _staves;
00053       QString _id;                  // used for MusicXml import
00054 
00055    public:
00056       Part(Score*);
00057       ~Part();
00058       void read(Score*, QDomNode);
00059       void write(Xml& xml) const;
00060       int nstaves() const;
00061       StaffList* staves() const           { return _staves; }
00062       Staff* staff(int idx) const;
00063       void setId(const QString& s)        { _id = s; }
00064       QString id() const                  { return _id; }
00065       QString shortName() const           { return _shortName; }
00066       QString longName() const            { return _longName;  }
00067       QString trackName() const           { return _trackName; }
00068       void setLongName(const QString& s)  { _longName = s;  }
00069       void setShortName(const QString& s) { _shortName = s; }
00070       void setTrackName(const QString& s) { _trackName = s; }
00071       void setStaves(int);
00072       void setMidiChannel(int val)        { _instrument.midiChannel = val;  }
00073       void setMidiProgram(int val)        { _instrument.midiProgram = val;  }
00074       void setMinPitch(int val)           { _instrument.minPitch = val;     }
00075       void setMaxPitch(int val)           { _instrument.maxPitch = val;     }
00076       int midiChannel() const             { return _instrument.midiChannel; }
00077       int midiProgram() const             { return _instrument.midiProgram; }
00078       int minPitch() const                { return _instrument.minPitch;    }
00079       int maxPitch() const                { return _instrument.maxPitch;    }
00080       int volume() const                  { return _instrument.volume;      }
00081       int reverb() const                  { return _instrument.reverb;      }
00082       int chorus() const                  { return _instrument.chorus;      }
00083       void insertStaff(Staff*);
00084       void removeStaff(Staff*);
00085       };
